channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sociable
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sociable

item.title: CVE-2021-24612|2024-08-03T19:35:20.204Z -- unknown -- sociable
item.description: The Sociable WordPress plugin through 4.3.4.1 does not sanitise or escape some of its settings before outputting them in the admins dashboard, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against other users even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
